[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@pago/reactive](./reactive.md) &gt; [SubscriptionController](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.md)

## SubscriptionController class

Manages the subscription to tracked references and objects within a `memoized` function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SubscriptionController 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(effect)](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new SubscriptionController. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cleanup?](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.cleanup.md) |  | [Effect](./reactive.effect.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> A cleanup effect that should be executed before the effect is executed again or on unsubscribe. |
|  [effect](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.effect.md) |  | [Effect](./reactive.effect.md) | The effect that is triggered whenever a tracked value changes after the controller has subscribed to changes. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [subscribe()](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.subscribe.md) |  | Subscribes to the set of tracked references and objects. Once subscribed, the [SubscriptionController.effect](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.effect.md) will be triggered whenever any of the values change. |
|  [unsubscribe()](./reactive.subscriptioncontroller.unsubscribe.md) |  | Unsubscribes from all tracked values. |
